column6: THE MORTAL IRON FIST PART 4 The epic finale to THE MORTAL IRON FIST is here! Danny Rand must come face-to-face with the dark force that has been killing Iron Fists for generations!
column8: | penciller:Travel Foreman | inker:Russ Heath | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth | colorist:Matt Milla | other:Dave Lanphear | writer:Duane Swierczynski
